gov.va.vinci.leo.cr

Class BaseLeoCollectionReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.resource.Resource_ImplBase
      • org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource_ImplBase
        • org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader_ImplBase
          • gov.va.vinci.leo.cr.BaseLeoCollectionReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LeoCollectionReaderInterface, org.apache.uima.collection.base_cpm.BaseCollectionReader, org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader, org.apache.uima.resource.ConfigurableResource, org.apache.uima.resource.Resource
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseDatabaseCollectionReader, BaseFileCollectionReader

    public abstract class BaseLeoCollectionReader
extends org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader_ImplBase
implements LeoCollectionReaderInterface
    Provides the CollectionReader interface object to the UIMA framework for implementations of SubReaders. This interface class allows us to provide a common data information structure propagated throughout every CAS object it produces.
    Author:
    thomasginter

      • addFilterList

        public void addFilterList(String[] filterList)
                   throws ClassNotFoundException,
                          IllegalAccessException,
                          InstantiationException
        Add the list of filters classes from a String list. Typically this list is coming from the Configuration Parameter input.
        Parameters:
        filterList - List of class names, each of which is a TextFilter
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if one of the filter classes cannot be found
        IllegalAccessException - if the filter class cannot be accessed
        InstantiationException - if the filter class cannot be instantiated.

      • addFilters

        public void addFilters(TextFilter... textFilters)
        Add one or more text filters to the list of filters to be applied to the document text before adding to the CAS.
        Parameters:
        textFilters - One or more filters to be added to the list

      • produceCollectionReader

        protected org.apache.uima.collection.CollectionReader produceCollectionReader(Set<org.apache.uima.resource.metadata.ConfigurationParameter> configurationParameters,
                                                                  Map<String,?> parameterValues)
                                                                       throws org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceInitializationException
        Returns a CollectionReader which has been initialized by the framework using the parameter settings provided.
        Parameters:
        configurationParameters - set of ConfigurationParameters to add to the descriptor.
        parameterValues - Map of parameter names to values to set in the descriptor.
        Returns:
        initialized CollectionReader object.
        Throws:
        org.apache.uima.resource.ResourceInitializationException - if there is an error initializing the CollectionReader.
